Posts.Content: Jun 16, 2012 07:19PM Imback wrote: I had 4 cycles of AC followed by 12 weeks of Taxol.  I started losing clumps of hair 2 weeks after my first AC session.  So I shaved my head immediately and I really enjoyed being bald.  Everyone told me the look suited me.  More importantly, I was in and out of the shower in 5 mins.  My hair started to grow back during the Taxol.  However, it was not my real hair.  What grew back was completely white peach fuzz.  It was very soft and looked like baby hair.  Before the end of the Taxol, I also began to feel stubble.  And yes, my dark hair began to grow, amidst the white peach fuzz.  The growth was not even, however.  First it grew on the top and back of my head, then on the sides, and the front area (bangs) came in last.  I had my last Taxol session on the 16th of January 2012.  Two weeks after the end of the Taxol, my eyelashes and eyerows, which had thinned out, fell out completely.  This was hard, since I thought that I would not lose them given that I had gone through 6 months of chemo and hadn't lost them yet.  When they grew back, about 2 months after the end of the chemo, they grew in in full force, thick and dense.  I never had such nice and long eyelashes.  My eyebrows were really full and I could shape them nicely.  Unfortunately, they are both falling off again.  My eyebrows are nearly gone and my eyelashes are really thin.  I heard that they can fall off up to three times in the first year after chemo.   Ugh!  Has anyone else experienced this?  I guess it's easier this time around because I've already been through this once.  But I was hoping it wouldn't happen to me.  I will try to take it all in stride.  I know they will come back.  If anyone else is going through this, hang in there, it will soon be over.
Posts.Title: Hair regrowth after DD Taxol sweetbean Byhisstripes419
